subject: Re: Digital Voice Recorder Advice
author: Robin Henson
full_text:
Wow, thanks for your help guys!

Ursula, your post was lovely.  I've been promising myself to learn 
more about Mark Macy's work and will check out his website ASAP. 
Ritualized versus random recording makes sense to me now, as I want 
to accomplish true communication rather than continue being verbally 
abused. Have you given up "ghost hunting" altogether? 

I've been looking at the Olympus VN-4100 PC, Zack!  I don't know if I 
need that much recording time, but I sure have liked the one I have 
and wouldn't mind upgrading a bit.  

Hi Frank! I basically follow your suggestion when recording, and once 
I learned to be quiet I actually started getting responses. I think 
the entities at my house got tired of playing with me though, and now 
they aren't saying anything.  I kind of miss them, but I do feel it's 
time to move on.

Robin
